name: Find The Shelter
description:
A little Game for the Week 152 with the theme Shleter

You're alone in a strange village where there is nobody around but strange pepoles. You have to find a place where you could be safe !

I'll update it in a few days with a clean final version.

Arts:

https://opengameart.org/content/zelda-like-tilesets-and-sprites

https://www.kindpng.com/imgv/hTRwmhJ_cat-and-dog-sprites-pixel-dog-sprite-sheet/

https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/zombies-well-at-least-the-basic...

Tools : Unity - Tiled
